attributes.action: to stop the downsizing or closure of the Camelia Botnar Childrens Centre in Worthing, West Sussex.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Camelia Botnar Childrens Centre provides free care for children, aged 5 and under, with special needs in the morning and children experiencing social or economic difficulties in the afternoon. This is the only childcare setting of this nature in the area and the board of trustees are proposing staff redundancies and the downsizing of the nursery. Please support us to stop this happening to a unique, much loved and needed facility which has provided a huge amount of support to families over the past 30 years.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "to stop the downsizing or closure of the Camelia Botnar Childrens Centre in Worthing, West Sussex."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page20809


Prime Minister's Office
